sentences.en: Allan gave an interview to the Chicago Tribune newspaper last month.
sentences.cn: 艾伦上个月接受了《芝加哥论坛报》的采访。

sentences.en: At least two people died of exposure in Chicago overnight.
sentences.cn: 昨天晚上，芝加哥至少有两人冻死。

sentences.en: Chicago has 6 graduate and professional schools of high repute.
sentences.cn: 芝加哥有6所颇负盛名的研究生院和专业院校。

sentences.en: Chicago provides a feast for the ears of any music lover.
sentences.cn: 《芝加哥》将给所有音乐爱好者献上一场听觉的盛宴。

sentences.en: Clarence Page is a columnist for the Chicago Tribune.
sentences.cn: 克拉伦斯·佩奇是《芝加哥论坛报》的专栏作家。

sentences.en: One insurance company has already filed suit against the city of Chicago.
sentences.cn: 一家保险公司已经对芝加哥市提起诉讼。

sentences.en: The Chicago River flooded the city'sunderground tunnel system.
sentences.cn: 芝加哥河的河水淹没了城市的地下隧道系统。

sentences.en: The company has transferred its main office from New York to Chicago.
sentences.cn: 公司已把总部从纽约迁到了芝加哥.

sentences.en: The company is headquartered in Chicago.
The police think the bank robbers are holed up in Chicago.
sentences.cn: 警方认为抢银行的人藏在芝加哥.

sentences.en: The railroad connects two cities, namely, New York and Chicago.
sentences.cn: 这条铁路连接两个城市, 即纽约与芝加哥.

sentences.en: They hoped to locate in Chicago.
sentences.cn: 他们希望在芝加哥定居。

sentences.en: They lost to Chicago in the play-offs.
sentences.cn: 在季后赛中他们负于芝加哥队。

sentences.en: We can organise car rental from Chicago O'Hare Airport.
sentences.cn: 我们可以安排提供从芝加哥奥黑尔机场出发的租车服务。

sentences.en: We must change at the next station for Chicago.
sentences.cn: 我们得在下一站换车去芝加哥.

sentences.en: We're just passing through on our way to Chicago.
sentences.cn: 我们是去芝加哥的,只是路过这里.

phrases.tran_cn: 芝加哥交易所（世界最大的谷物交易所）
芝加哥学派（美国19世纪晚期由建筑师和工程师组成的一个学派）
